author: James R. Carr <james.r.carr@gmail.com> (http://blog.james-carr.org)
name: mongoosastic
description: A mongoose plugin that indexes models into elastic search

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test/*-test.js -t 600000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
